condition.value: dm_dbo.single_result_row_view where exists (select * from cd_controlled_doc where r_lock_owner != ' ' and r_object_type in('cd_clinical_trial_info','cd_clinical_tmf_doc') and r_object_id = '$value(r_object_id)')

dm_dbo.single_result_row_view where exists(SELECT * FROM dm_workflow WHERE r_object_id IN (SELECT r_workflow_id FROM dmi_package WHERE ANY r_component_id = '$value(r_object_id)') AND r_runtime_state='1' AND object_name LIKE 'Cat 1 GMP withdrawal%') or exists (select * from cd_controlled_doc where r_object_id='$value(r_object_id)' and a_status = 'Effective' and can_be_withdrawn = true and planned_withdraw_date is not nulldate) or exists (select * from cd_controlled_doc where r_lock_owner != ' ' and r_object_type in('cd_clinical_trial_info','cd_clinical_tmf_doc') and r_object_id = '$value(r_object_id)') or exists (select * from cd_controlled_doc where r_object_id='$value(r_object_id)' and is_placeholder=true)
